title.narrative: 4.1.1 IMPROVE COORDINATN MECHANISM OF LG

description.narrative: By 2014, Local Government/CSOs partners in 60 Upazilas have improved coordination mechanisms & resources to ensure synergy and complementarity in programme delivery to children and their families with focus on equity., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Public Finance And Local Governance. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 4. Capacity Building & Com Empowermtd Civil Society Organizations, in particular those in 20 selected districts, are more effective in ensuring the realization of the rights of children and women with equity.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2014, Local Government/CSOs partners in 60 Upazilas have improved coordination mechanisms & resources to ensure synergy andcomplementarity in programme delivery to children and their families with focus on equity.

description.narrative: Convergence Coordination Committees able to perform as ‘Children's Platforms', discussing the issues of children and women and monitoring the implementation of planned activities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: of quarterly progress reviews conducted and reported in all the 20 districts and follow-up actions taken

actual.value: 2016:80 quarterly review meetings held.Achievements against plans were identified.Lessons and challenges were discussed. Follow-up actions were documented.

title.narrative: of review meetings and joint monitoring visits to review district plans for children

baseline.value: Inter-ministerial meeting (0), 2 visits from national level, 6 divisional reviews and 2 monitoring visits

target.value: 2015:2 Inter-ministerial meetings, 2 joint visits from national level, 12 divisional reviews and 12 monitoring visits

actual.value: 2016:2 inter-ministerial meetings were held at ERD.2 visits were paid by the national level partners.7 Divisional Reviews held with all sectoral partnersA total of 55 monitoring visits were conducted.
